original_title: 15 injured in Epitawala accident involving bus and lorry
original_body_lines: A total of 15 individuals have sustained injuries in an accident involving a private bus and a lorry in Epitawala, along the Horana–Ratnapura main road this morning (16), police stated.
It has been revealed that the bus was transporting employees of a private company.
The injured have been admitted to Idangoda and Ratnapura hospitals.
